ekbom syndrome.gloss: feeling of uneasiness and restlessness in the legs after going to bed (sometimes causing insomnia)

ekg.gloss: a graphical recording of the cardiac cycle produced by an electrocardiograph

ekman.gloss: Swedish oceanographer who recognized the role of the Coriolis effect on ocean currents (1874-1954)

eke out.gloss: supplement what is thought to be deficient
make by laborious and precarious means
